results.title: Gastrointestinal adverse events of metformin treatment in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A systematic review, meta-analysis and meta-regression of randomized controlled trials
results.text_hl: The effect size (RR) for the @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (intervention) vs. comparator (control).

results.title: Unusual Case of Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis in Patient with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: Nevertheless, the intentional increase of his dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to 3000 mg per day led to @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal reactions@@@, including @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, and @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, which caused severe @DISEASE_Dehydration @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@, followed by the development of @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@, one of the results of @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@.

citations.NLM: Hai PD, Thu NT, Phuong LL, Manh NV, Hoa LTV. Unusual Case of Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis in Patient with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Am J Case Rep. 2022 Nov 17;23():e937865. PMID: 36384864

results.title: Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ can cause issues with the gastrointestinal tract and result in @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Gas_bloat_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C535647 @@@bloating@@@, or @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@.

citations.NLM: Desai S, Thompson T. Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine. Int J Pharm Compd. 2023 Sep-Oct;27(5):362-366. PMID: 37816179
citations.BibTeX: @article{37816179, title={Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine.}, author={Desai S and Thompson T}, journal={Int J Pharm Compd}, volume={27}, number={5}, pages={362-366}}

results.title: Comparative efficacy and safety of glucose-lowering drugs in children and adolescents with type 2 diabetes: A systematic review and network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: There were no significant differences between treatments in the incidence of adverse events, except that liraglutide+@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had significant adverse effect such as @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@.

results.title: A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis and Transient Blindness
results.text_hl: However, because of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s large volume of distribution, the significance of these data is debatable without quantifying @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ removal.

results.title: Metformin Treatment: A Potential Cause of Megaloblastic Anemia in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: Alongside lifestyle changes, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is indicated from the very diagnosis of the disease.

results.title: Long-Acting Metformin Vs. Metformin Immediate Release in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: A Systematic Review
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@Gastrointestinal intolerance@@@ is a major concern associated with clinical use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@; approximately 10% of adults living with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ are unable to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment because of @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal intolerance@@@ including @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, and @DISEASE_Constipation @DISEASE_MESH:D003248 @@@constipation@@@.

citations.NLM: Tan J, Wang Y, Liu S, Shi Q, Zhou X, Zhou Y, Yang X, Chen P, Li S. Long-Acting Metformin Vs. Metformin Immediate Release in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: A Systematic Review Front Pharmacol. 2021;12():669814. PMID: 34079464

results.title: Metformin-associated lactic acidosis: reinforcing learning points.
results.text_hl: We present the case of a man in his early 20s with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ who presented with @DISEASE_Psychomotor_Agitation @DISEASE_MESH:D011595 @@@agitation@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ after ingesting 50-60 g of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@; he developed severe @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (blood pH 6.93, @CHEMICAL_Bicarbonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001639 @@@bicarbonate@@@ 7.8 mEq/L, @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ 28.0 mEq/L).

citations.NLM: Goonoo MS, Morris R, Raithatha A, Creagh F. Metformin-associated lactic acidosis: reinforcing learning points. BMJ Case Rep. 2020 Sep 2;13(9):. PMID: 32878828
citations.BibTeX: @article{32878828, title={Metformin-associated lactic acidosis: reinforcing learning points.}, author={Goonoo MS and Morris R and Raithatha A and Creagh F}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={13}, number={9}}
